scripts.start: npm run build && npm run server
scripts.dev:check: node -e "console.log('Checking environment...'); if (!require('fs').existsSync('.env')) { console.error('❌ .env file not found'); process.exit(1); } console.log('✅ .env file exists'); if (!require('dotenv').config().parsed?.GEMINI_API_KEY) { console.error('❌ GEMINI_API_KEY not found in .env'); process.exit(1); } console.log('✅ GEMINI_API_KEY configured'); console.log('Starting development servers...');" && npm run dev:full
scripts.setup: npm run install:deps && echo 'Please create a .env file with your GEMINI_API_KEY'
scripts.health:check: curl -f http://localhost:3001/api/health || echo 'Backend server not responding'
